meanings.definition: A person who is clever or astute in business or financial matters.
meanings.sent1: The shrewdie knew exactly when to invest in the stock market.
meanings.sent2: She proved to be a shrewdie when negotiating the business deal.
meanings.sent3: The shrewdie found a way to save money by using coupons.
meanings.sent4: Like a shrewdie, he navigated the complex world of finance effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: Her reputation as a shrewdie in the business world was well-deserved.

meanings.sent1: Being a shrewdie, he always found creative solutions to problems.
meanings.sent2: She was known as a shrewdie for her quick thinking and resourcefulness.
meanings.sent3: The little shrewdie outsmarted the tricky puzzle in no time.
meanings.sent4: His eyes gleamed with the shrewdie intelligence that set him apart.
meanings.sent5: In the story, the protagonist was portrayed as a shrewdie who outwitted the villain.
